medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was first evaluated at age 37 for a pituitary mass detected on MRI and had a 3-year history of hypertension controlled with medication.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of acromegaly, hypertension, multiple paragangliomas (PGL), and bilateral pheochromocytomas (PHEO).
medical_history.family_history: Family history notable for hypertension and type 2 diabetes in the patient's mother, and paternal uncle operated for bilateral neck masses.
